loans.use: To buy cooking oil, aqua, ketchup, toothpaste, notebooks, soft drinks and other things to sell.

loans.name: Iemaima

texts.en: Iemaima is 52 years old and married with three children. She has a small plantation where she grows bananas that she can sell in her community or at the market. She has been doing this for one year. Iemaima needs a loan to buy a spade, chemicals, fertilizer, new overalls, a shovel, a new wheelbarrow and a machete. She has been a member of SPBD since 2014. Iemaima will use the profits from her sales to pay for her family's weekly expenses.

loans.use: to buy a spade, chemicals, fertilizer, new overalls, a shovel, a new wheelbarrow and a machete

loans.name: Merlina

texts.en: Merlina is married with two children and lives in the coastal area of Misamis Occidental. She helps her husband in their fishing business. Her husband does fishing while she sells fish in their village. Her children have their own family and are willing to support her in her needs but she and her husband keep on working to keep alive and earn an income of their own. She joined GDMPC and is borrowing to repair the fishing boat used in the business. She plans to save a portion of her income for their future needs.

loans.use: to repair her fishing boat

loans.name: Maria Bella

texts.en: Maria Bella 24, is a mother of two who sells grocery goods while her husband works in town to make a living. She settled with her family in Misamis Occidental. For many years, they were able to support the needs of her children and the family as well. She needs more stock to offer to her customers. For this reason, she joined GDMPC and borrowed a loan to purchase more grocery goods to sell. She hopes to improve the business to ensure a better source of income for the family in the future. She wants to have a better life with her family and to see her children have a better education in the future.

loans.use: to purchase more grocery goods to sell.

loans.name: Vasa

texts.en: Vasa is 26 years old and married with 2 children. She makes and sells elei printed material to earn a living and has been doing this for one year. Vasa has requested a loan to buy material, fabric paint, wooden carved designs, rubber designs and rollers. She plans to use her profits to pay for her family's weekly expenses. She joined SPBD in 2014 to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy material, fabric paint, wooden carved designs, rubber designs and rollers

loans.name: Adora

texts.en:
Adora is a 39-year-old married woman with four children, all of whom attend school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. 

Adora has a business selling dried fish in the Philippines. Adora requested a PHP 18,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase more fish to make dried fish.

Adora has been in this business for seven years. In the future, Adora would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to school.

loans.use: to purchase more fish to make dried fish.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy cement, sand, gravel, bricks, iron, metal sheeting and wood to build a bathroom in her house.

loans.name: Beatriz

texts.en:
Beatriz is 60 years old and married with five children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. 

Beatriz has a tailoring business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy new supplies for her tailoring business.

Beatriz has been in this business for 10 years. In the future, Beatriz would like to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy new supplies for her tailoring business.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
Elizabeth is 47 years old and married with four children.  With two children in school, she works very hard to provide for them.

Elizabeth runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 5,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase more stock of groceries to sell.

She has been in this business for six years and sells a variety of items such as sugar, soap, noodles and other groceries. 

In the future, Elizabeth would like to save enough money to expand her business and continue to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more stock of groceries to sell.

loans.name: Jose Agustin

texts.es:
José de 51 años de edad, solo pudo estudiar hasta 8° grado de educación básica, es padre soltero y tiene 4 hijos.

Trabaja en el mercado local, tiene un carretón con el que le solicitan llevar sacos de frutas y verduras y él cobra por el traslado de la mercadería, además es agricultor.

El préstamo será utilizado para pagar una deuda con un prestamista, deuda que adquirió para construir su casa. Una vez pagada la deuda seguirá trabajando para darle lo necesario a sus hijos
texts.en:
José, 51, was only able to study through the eighth grade..  He is single, has four children, and works at the local market where he operates a cart and transports fruits and vegetables for people who request the service.  He charges for transporting merchandise and also works as a farmer.

The loan he is requesting is to pay off a debt he incurred when he built his house.  Once he pays off the debt he will continue working to provide all that is necessary for his children.

loans.use: To pay off debt.

loans.name: Yolanda Guadalupe

texts.es: Yolanda de 31 años de edad habita en vivienda propia junto a su compañero de vida y sus 2 hijos de 15 y 13 años de edad. Ella es una mujer que todos los días sale desde muy temprano de su vivienda, a ganarse la vida prestando sus servicios domésticos, para apoyar a su compañero de vida con los gastos económicos del hogar, su compañero de vida se desempeña como albañil y es así como sostiene la economía familiar. Yolanda desea construir las paredes de su vivienda ya  que actualmente son de lamina, ya que ella cree no son muy seguras, por lo que desea adquirir un crédito con FUSAI para invertir en: ladrillo, cemento, arena, grava y hierro para construir las paredes de su vivienda, Yolanda adquirió anteriormente un crédito con la institución el cual utilizo para reparar el techo y comprar ventanas con el cual quedo muy agradecida.
texts.en:
Yolanda, 31, lives in her own house with her common-law husband and their two children, ages 15 and 13.  She is a woman who gets up early every morning to go out and work as a domestic employee to help her husband with the household expenses.  Her husband works as a bricklayer and together they support the family economy.

Yolanda wants to build walls in her house because they are currently made of metal sheeting.  She feels they are not very safe so she is requesting a loan through FUSAI to buy bricks, cement, sand, gravel and iron to build the walls.  Yolanda had a previous loan through the institution which she used to repair the roof and buy windows, for which she is very grateful.

loans.use: To buy bricks, cement, sand, gravel, and iron to build the walls of her house.

loans.name: Carminda

texts.en: Carminda lives in Suai. She is a businesswoman and has a kiosk in her house. She is requesting a loan of $1,000 from Tuba Rai Metin, because she wants to buy additional items including cooking oil, noodles, sardines, aqua, candies, perfume, soaps, milk, slippers, biscuits, candles, cigarettes and  other things to sell Including soft drinks. She has been involved in business since 2008. She started with her own working capital of $250. She is happy to take a loan from Tuba Rai Metin because with the loan, she can learn how to improve her management and open a big store in the future. She also has animals in her house like cows, pigs and chickens.

loans.use: to buy more products to sell in her general store

loans.name: Phalla

texts.en:
Phalla is a 31-year-old married woman .She has two dependent children who are currently in school. She lives in a small village in Pursat Province, Cambodia. To make a living and support her family, she manages and operates a farming business, growing rice and selling the crops to the local dealers .Her husband, Rorn, is a teacher who can make a decent profit to support the whole family.

Phalla wants to improve the general living conditions of the entire family by having a latrine to use, because there is no latrine in her house now. Therefore, she is borrowing a loan from Kiva to build a latrine. By doing this, she can help her family members gain access to sanitation, promote their health, and help to lessen environmental deterioration. She is thankful for the loan granted through HKL with a much lower interest rate than other general loan products.

loans.use: to build a latrine

loans.name: Gemma

texts.en:
Gemma is 29 years old, married and has one child in school. 

Gemma is in the aquaculture business (oysters) in the Philippines. Gemma requested a PHP 17,000 loan through NWTF to purchase binder, bamboo and other raw materials for her oyster culture.

Gemma has been in oyster culture for three years now, and has borrowed six times in the past from NWTF to sustain the business.

In the future, Gemma would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase binder, bamboo and other raw materials for her oyster culture.

loans.name: Riza

texts.en: Riza lives in the coastal area of Misamis Occidental with her family. She is 37 and has five children who are studying in a public school. Their main source of income is from fishing and for over ten years, they have been able to support the needs of their children. All she wants in life is to see her children having a better education and the only way of earning is through fishing. To improve their business, she is taking a new loan from GDMPC micro credit to buy new fishing nets. In the future, she plans to acquire additional fishing equipment to expand their business.

loans.use: to buy new fishing nets

loans.name: Jarin

texts.en:
Jarin is 29 years old and married with two children, one of whom is in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur.  

Jarin has a fishing business in the Philippines. Jarin requested a PHP 15000 loan through NWTF in order to buy fishing gear and other equipment.

Jarin has been in this business for three years. In the future, Jarin would like to save enough money to expand her business and repair her family's home.

loans.use: to buy fishing gear and other equipment.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase materials like cement and sand, to build her house.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in: sheet metal, bricks, cement, sand, gravel and iron to build a wall and replace the roof on her home.

loans.name: Percy Luis

texts.es:
Percy tiene 28 años de edad, vive con su familia, en una zona rural del distrito de Morropón pero cuenta con servicios públicos(agua y luz). Morropón es un pueblo que se dedica a la crianza de ganado vacuno, agricultura(arroz) y comercio; está ubicado en la región de Piura, costa norte de Perú.

La actividad que desarrolla Percy es la crianza y comercialización de aves y también se dedica a la agricultura (como peon agricola). Él necesita del crédito para mejoras de su casa (cosntruccion de un cuarto de adobe) lo que le va a permitir vivir con mayor comodidad mejroando de esta manera su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Percy is 28 years old and lives with his family in the rural zone of the Morropón district, but has public utilities (water and electricity). Morropón is a village that devotes itself to breeding cattle, agriculture (rice) and commerce; it is located in the Piura region, on the northern coast of Peru.

Percy works breeding and selling birds and also works in agriculture (as a farmhand). He needs the loan for home renovations (construction of an adobe room), this will allow him to live more comfortably thereby improving his quality of life.

loans.use: to renovate his house (construction of an adobe bedroom).

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in: cement, sand, gravel and tools to repair his home's water basin.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in: cobblestones, cement and sand to place cobblestones in her yard.

loans.name: Roeurng

texts.en:
Roeurng, who is 59 years old, lives in a community of Banteay Menchey Province, Cambodia. He has dependent children who are currently in school, and he also has three married children.  He is an active and honest rice farmer who can make an income of around USD 3.00 per day. So far, he has been in this career for 34 years.  

Roeurng wants to improve the general living conditions of the entire family by having a latrine to use, because there is no latrine in his house now. Therefore, he is borrowing a loan from Kiva to build a latrine. By doing this, he can help his family members gain access to sanitation, promote their health, and help to lessen environmental deterioration. He is thankful for the loan granted through HKL with a much lower interest rate than other general loan products.

loans.use: to build a latrine

loans.name: Kong

texts.en:
Kong, who is 30 years old, lives in a community of Banteay Menchey Province, Cambodia. He has only one little child. He is an active and honest rice farmer who can make an income of around USD 3.00 per day. So far, he has been in this career for 14 years.  

Kong wants to improve the general living conditions of the entire family by having a latrine to use, because there is no latrine in his house now. Therefore, he is borrowing a loan from Kiva to build a latrine. By doing this, he can help his family members gain access to sanitation, promote their health, and help to lessen environmental deterioration. 

He is thankful for the loan granted through HKL with a much lower interest rate than other general loan products.

loans.use: to build a latrine

loans.name: Lanie

texts.en:
Lanie is 38 years old and married with three children who are all attending school.

She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines, and requested a PHP 21,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy more stock of rice, snack foods, charcoal and other groceries.

Lanie has borrowed and repaid 16 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 12 years, and also earns an income from charcoal retailing.

Lanie aspires to save enough money to expand her business and continue to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy more stock of rice, snack foods, charcoal and other groceries.

loans.name: Lealofi

texts.en:
Lealofi is 48 years old and married with four children. She has a small plantation where she grows taro and bananas that she can sell in her community or at the market. She has been doing this for 10 years. 

Lealofi needs a loan to buy fertilizer, a spade, new overalls, chemicals, a new wheelbarrow, and crops. 

She has been a member of SPBD since 2004. Lealofi will use the profits from her sales to pay for her family's weekly expenses.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, a spade, new overalls, chemicals, a new wheelbarrow, and crops

loans.name: Narantsetseg

texts.en:
Mrs. Narantsetseg, 53 years old, lives with her husband, son, daughter-in-law and granddaughter in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. The family income comes from her sentry job at a public apartment, and her husband's taxi service. Their son and daughter-in-law are both graduating from their university next summer. 

She is requesting a loan of 4,000,000 MNT to pay the tuition fees of her son and daughter-in-law. As a result, her son and daughter-in-law will study hard without worrying about tuition fees. 

In the borrower profile picture, the borrower is together with her family: daughter-in-law, herself, her husband, and three-month-old granddaughter.

loans.use: to pay the tuition fees of her son and daughter-in-law

loans.name: Monalisa

texts.en:
Mosalisa is a 34-year-old married woman with six children. She runs a small canteen in her community to earn a living. She has one year of experience with this business. 

Monalisa needs a loan to buy donuts, pies, soft drinks, a large boiler, sugar, and coffee. 

She plans to use her profits to pay for her family's weekly expenses. Monalisa has been a member of SPBD since 2014.

loans.use: to buy donuts, pies, soft drinks, a large boiler, sugar, and coffee

loans.name: Ma. Theresa

texts.en:
Ma. Theresa is 45 years old and married. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. 

Ma. Theresa has a clothing sales business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 17,000 loan amount through NWTF in order to buy more stock of pants, blouses and other ready to wear clothing.

Ma. Theresa has been in this business for three years. In the future, she would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more stock of pants, blouses and other ready to wear clothing.

loans.name: Diane

texts.en:
Diane settled for a living in a village located in Aurora, Zamboanga del Sur. She is 50, and had three children. 

She sells jewelry products  to her neighbors, and aside from this, she also managed their peanut farm. Her husband is a councilman in their community and is also working with her on their farm. She had joined GDMPC earlier, and had borrowed a loan to buy additional ladies accessories and a portion of it to buy organic fertilizer for her peanut production. 

Improving this businesses is her intense desire, in order to have a better source of income in the near future.

loans.use: to buy additional ladies accessories and a portion of it to buy organic fertilizer for her peanut production

loans.name: Telesia

texts.en:
Telesia is 46 years old and married with 4 children. She owns and operates a small store, selling a variety of items. She has been doing this for two years. 

Telesia needs a loan to buy bags of flour, sugar, rice, salt, a new scale, and a new chest freezer. 

She hopes to use her profits to pay for the renovation of her house. She became a member of SPBD in 2012 to gain access to capital for her business.

loans.use: to buy bags of flour, sugar, rice, salt, a new scale, and a new chest freezer

loans.name: Jenny

texts.en:
Jenny is 23 years old and married with two children, one of whom is in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. 

Jenny has a aquaculture business (oyster) in the Philippines. Jenny requested a PHP 14,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy bamboo, binder and other materials.

She has been in this business for three years.  In the future, Jenny would like to save enough money in order to support the financial stability of her family.

loans.use: to buy bamboo, binder and other materials.

loans.name: Mae

texts.en:
Mae is 24 years old and married with two children, one of whom is in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. 

Mae has a aquaculture business (oyster) in the Philippines. Mae requested a PHP 14,000 loan amount through NWTF in order to purchase binder, bamboo and other materials.

Mae has been in this business for three years. In the future, Mae would like to save enough money to expand her business and repair her family's home.

loans.use: to purchase binder, bamboo and other materials.

loans.name: Cornelia

texts.en:
Cornelia is married and her husband is a driver. She has a kiosk in her house, so she is requesting a loan of $1500 from Tuba Rai Metin to buy some additional  supplies to keep in her kiosk, such as candles, soaps, toothpaste, biscuits, perfume, candies, sardines, deho, malin, shampoo, detergents and other things to sell, Including soft drinks. 

She has been involving in business activities since 2011; she started with her own working capital of $ 500. She is taking a loan because she wants to improve her kiosk in the future. 

She was happy when Tuba Rai Metin offered her the loan because with the loan, she can opened a bigger store in the future.

loans.use: To buy candles, soaps, toothpaste, biscuits, perfume, candies, sardines, deho, malin, shampoo, detergents and other things to sell, Including soft drinks.

loans.name: Bertha Alejandrina

texts.es:
La socia Bertha sigue dedicándose al negocio de  venta de productos de belleza a sus clientes que le solicitan como amistades, familiares entre otros, la socia dese poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de colonias para varon.
La socia Bertha se siente agradecida con el préstamo otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Bertha continues to work selling beauty products to her customers who ask for them such as friends and family among others. She wants to be able to continue working to, in this way, continue supporting her family. 

She asks for a loan to purchase men's colognes. 

She is grateful for the offered loan and promises to make the payments on the established schedule.

loans.use: to purchase men's colognes.

loans.name: Martha Julia

texts.es: Martha, tiene 36 años de edad, vive en unión libre con su esposo, con quien tiene dos hijos, vive en el municipio de Morazán, Yoro. Siempre se ha dedicado al comercio hace mas de 7 años se dedica a la venta de ropa como pantalones, camisas, ropa intima, ropa de cama, cortinas, forros de muebles, etc. La venta la realiza de manera ambulante.Ella ha mantenido el negocio mediante varios prestamos, actualmente solicita otro por 2,000 lempiras para surtir de pantalones, ropa intima y forros de cama. Con esta inversión considera satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes. Su plan a futuro es que sus hijos puedan terminar sus estudios y también terminar su casa.
texts.en:
Martha is 36 years old.  She lives with her common-law husband and their two children in the town of Morazán, Yoro.  She has always worked as a merchant, and for more than seven years, she has worked selling clothing including pants, shirts, underwear, sleepwear, curtains, furniture covers, and more.  She makes her sales as a street vendor.  

She has maintained her business with various loans, and she is currently requesting another for 2,000 lempiras to stock her business with pants, underwear, and bed covers.  With this investment, she will be able to satisfy all of her customers' needs.  Her plan for the future is that her children finish school and she finishes her house.

loans.use: to stock her business with pants, underwear, and bed covers.

loans.name: Emiliana

texts.es:
La socia Emiliana sigue dedicándose al negocio de venta de productos de primera necesidad, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa, siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia.

La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de leche, aceite entre otros.
La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en: The member Emiliana continues to make a living selling staple goods. By being a responsible and diligent person she is able to bring up her family. The member is requesting a loan to buy milk, oil and other things. She feels grateful for the loan offered and she promises to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy milk, oil and other things.

loans.name: Godofredo Carlos

texts.es:
El socio Carlos sigue dedicándose a trabajar en una entidad del estado en el área administrativa ,el socio lleva buen tiempo en su trabajo el cual le trae satisfacciones tanto económicas como personales, él socio desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir adelante.
El socio solicita el crédito para la compra de viveres para su casa.
El socio agradece a los inversionistas por el apoyo brindado y se compromete a pagar sus cuotas puntuales y con mucha responsabilidad.
texts.en:
Carlos continues to work for a government entity in the area of administration. He has been at this job for some time; it brings him both economic and personal satisfaction. He wants to be able to continue working and, in this way, continue getting ahead.

He asks for a loan to purchase supplies for his house.

He is grateful to the investors for the offered support and promises to make his payments punctually and responsibly.

loans.use: to purchase supplies for his house.

loans.name: Lucila

texts.es:
La socia Lucila sigue dedicándose al negocio de venta de leche a todos sus clientes que le solicitan, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa, siendo de esta manera que la socia saca  adelante a su familia.
La socia solicito el crédito para la compra de leche. 
La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
Lucila continues to work selling milk to all of her customers who ask for it. She is a responsible and enterprising person, being that this is the way she gets her family ahead. 

She asks for the loan to purchase milk. 

She is grateful for the loan that has been granted and promises to make the established payments.

loans.use: to purchase milk.

loans.name: Marli Elizabeth

texts.es:
Marli tiene 25 años de edad, es madre soltera, con dos hijos a su cargo, vive en casa propia; domiciliada en una zona rural del distrito de Oyotun, provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, costa norte de Perú.

Marli se dedica a la venta de cerveza, gaseosa, golosinas, entre otros; hace 7 años, su negocio se encuentra ubicado en su domicilio, ella solicita préstamo para invertir en capital de trabajo; pues desea comprar cerveza, y gaseosas para icrementar el stock en su negocio, lo que le ayudará a incrementar su negocio, captar más clientes y por ende mejorar sus ingresos y su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Marli is 25 years old and a single mother with two children in her care.  She lives in a house she owns located in a rural area in the Oyotun district, Chiclayo province, and Lambayeque region on the northern coast of Peru.  

Marli has worked selling beer, soda, snacks, and other items for seven years.  Her business is located in her home.  She is requesting this loan to invest in working capital because she wants to buy beer and soda to increase the stock in her store.  This will help her to expand her business, gain more customers, and therefore improve her profits and quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase beer and soda to increase the stock at her store.

loans.name: Zenobia

texts.es:
La socia Zenobia sigue  dedicándose al negocio de  venta de comida a todos sus clientes que le solicitan, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.

La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de arroz, carnes entre otros.
La socia Zenobia se siente agradecida con el préstamo otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The member Zenobia remains committed to the business of selling food to all her customers. She wants to continue working in order to carry on supporting her family in this way.

She is asking for the loan in order to buy rice and meat, among other things.

Zenobia is grateful for the loan granted and promises to make the repayments in the agreed timescale.

loans.use: to buy rice and meat, among other things.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a refrigerator

loans.name: Gustavo Josue

texts.es:
Gustavo Josue tiene 43 años de edad, es casado, tiene 2 hijos a su cargo, vive con su familia en una zona rural del distrito de Oyotún, provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, costa norte de Perú. La comunidad donde vive Gustavo Josue la población se dedica a la agricultura, ganadería y comercio.

Gustavo Josue se dedica a la venta de raspadillas cuyos sabores son de fresa, vainilla, chocolate, coco y lúcuma; con más de 10 años de experiencia en el negocio, está ubicado a las afueras de su domicilio, él solicita préstamo para capital de trabajo, pues necesita compra de insumos para la producción de los jarabes, dicha inversión le servirá para tener mayor variedad de sabores de jarabes en lo que respecta a sus raspadillas, con gran influencia en el negocio; cliente piensa incrementar su stock de insumos para poder atender las diversas gustos y preferencias de los clientes de la zona.
texts.en:
Gustavo Josue is 43 years old, married, has 2 children in his care, and lives with his family in a rural zone in Oyotún district, Chiclayo province, Lambayeque region, on the northern coast of Perú. In the community where Gustavo Josua lives, the people work in agriculture, animal husbandry, and trade. 

Gustavo Josue works selling shaved ices, whose flavors are strawberry, vanilla, chocolate, coconut and lúcuma. He has more than 10 years of experience in this business, and it is located outside of his house.  He asks for a loan for his working capital, since he needs to buy supplies to make the syrups. This investment will serve him to have a greater variety of flavors of syrup for his shaved ices, with a strong impact on his business. He plans to increase his stock of supplies to be able to meet the various tastes and preferences of his customers in the zone.

loans.use: to increase his working capital, since he needs to purchase supplies to make syrups.

loans.name: Jacinta

texts.es:
La socia Jacinta sigue dedicándose al negocio de venta de golosinas, tortas, gaseosas, pasteles, galletas entre otros en su kiosco escolar, la socia lleva buen tiempo con su negocio el cual le trae satisfacciones personales, siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de gaseosas entre otros.
La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
Jacinta continues working in her business selling candies, cakes, soft drinks, pastries, and cookies among other things in her school food stand. She has been in this business for some time, which brings her personal satisfaction, being that in this way she gets her family ahead.

She asks for a loan to purchase soft drinks, among other things.

She is grateful for the offered loan and promises to meet the established payment schedule.

loans.use: to purchase soft drinks, among others.

loans.name: Maria Catalina

texts.es: María, tiene 36 años de edad, está casada, tiene 4 hijos, vive con su familia en una aldea del municipio de Siguatepeque, cerca de Taulabe. Ella  se dedica a la venta de productos comestibles desde hace 4 años. Tiene una pulpería en su casa y vende arroz, azúcar, manteca, frijoles, sal, harina, espaguetis, refrescos, harina y otros abarrotes. ha solicitado un segundo ciclo de préstamo por 11,000 lempiras, este dinero lo invertirá en la compra de granos básicos, azúcar, jabón, café, pan, churros, manteca y refrescos con el fin de incrementar su inventario. su plan es que en la próxima inversión va surtir de abarrotes y carnes.
texts.en: María, 36 years old, is married, has 4 children, and lives with her family in a village in the municipality of Siguatepeque, near Taulabe. She has worked selling food goods for the past 4 years. She has a grocery store in her house and sells rice, sugar, butter, beans, salt, flour, pasta, soft drinks, flour, and other groceries. She has asked for a second loan of 11,000 lempiras; she will invest this money in the purchase of basic grains, sugar, soap, coffee, bread, churros, butter and soft drinks with the goal of increasing her inventory. Her plan is that with her next investment, she will stock groceries and meat.

loans.use: to purchase basic grains, sugar, soap, coffee, bread, churros, butter and soft drinks to stock her grocery store.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy bricks, cement, sand and iron.

loans.name: Dilfredo

texts.es:
Dilfredo tiene 39 años de edad, tiene hogar estable al lado de su cónyuge y tres menores hijos en edad escolar, dos en escuela primaria de 10 - 8 años y uno en pronoi deL caserío Tayales distrito Santo Tomas, vive en casa propia de material rustico de un piso, Dilfredo es nacido en caserío Tayales sector el salluc, él se lleva bien con los miembros de su caserío y pobladores de la zona; tiene calificación 100% normal en centrales de riesgo; y cuenta con buenas referencias personales y comerciales en la zona, vivienda cuenta con servicios de agua. Dicho distrito está ubicado en la provincia de Cutervo, región de Cajamarca, sierra norte de Perú.

La actividad que realiza Dilfredo es el cultivo de café, contando a la fecha con 2 has. Variedad catimor resistente a enfermedades, plantación está en tercer y cuarto año de producción tiene tres y cuotro años de edad, cultiva café en caserío Tayales del distrito Santo Tomás, actividad la realiza hace 10 años, cuenta con experiencia en el rubro del cultivo de café. Adicionalmente se dedica a la cría de animales menores(gallinas, cuyes, chanchos y otros), también cultiva productos de pan llevar (maíz, menestras, yuca, plátanos y otros).

El destino del crédito será para mantenimiento y cultivo de 2 has. De café en producción, asegurando una buena producción para campaña 2015, reflejado en un mayor volumen de ventas y por ende obtendrá mayores ingresos para así poder mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Dilfredo is 39 years old, has a stable home at the side of his spouse and three young school-aged children. Two are in primary school, ages 10 and 8, and one is in the PRONOEI (the Peruvian preschool system) in Tayales, a small village in Santo Tomás district. He lives in his own one-story house made of rustic materials. Dilfredo was born in Tayales vilage, in El Salluc sector, and gets along well with the people in his village and the residents of the zone. He has a 100% credit rating, and has good personal and business references in the zone. His house has water services. This district is located in Cutervo province, in Cajamarca region in the northern mountains of Perú.  

The work that Dilfredo does is growing coffee, having 2 hectares of Catimor coffee, a variety that is disease-resistant. His field has been in production for three and a quarter years, he cultivates his coffee in Tayales village in Santo Tomás district, work he has done for 10 years. He has experience in the field of coffee production. Additionally, he raises small animals (chickens, guinea pigs, pigs, and others), and also grows staple crops (corn, legumes, yucca, bananas and others).

The destination of this loan will be to maintain and cultivate 2 hectares of coffee crops, assuring a good production for the 2015 season, reflecting an increased volume of sales and with the end of getting increased income to be able to improve his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to maintain and cultivate 2 hectares of coffee crops, assuring a good harvest for the 2015 season.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in a door and windows to install in her house.

loans.name: Nuevas Amigas  (Cuenca) Group

texts.es:
El grupo de crédito Nuevas Amigas está formado por 15 socias quienes viven por diferentes lugares de la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad se encuentra bañada por 4 ríos los que le regalan a la ciudad hermosos paisajes, tiene una mezcla entre lo colonial y lo moderno, es desde Diciembre de 1999 Patrimonio Cultural de la Humanidad. Su gente es cálida y hospitalaria como las socias quienes le hacen sentir a sus visitantes como si estuvieran en casa, aun mantienen la cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos, se caracterizan por ser muy trabajadoras y siempre están en la búsqueda de un mejor futuro para su familia.
Una de las socias de este grupo es la Señora. Guadalupe, tiene 24 años de edad, vive en unión libre y ha concebido 2 hijos de 4 y 2 años de edad, su primer hijo este año ingresa a la escuelita, su esposo labora como técnico eléctrico, no tiene casa propia por lo que vive en una casa prestada de un familiar.
Doña Guadalupe pasa en casa al cuidado de sus hijos, también se dedica a la cría de  cuyes, gallinas y pollos, esta actividad le ha dado la facilidad de generar ingresos. El dinero de su crédito es para comprar pollos y alimento para animales. Su meta es tener una tienda.
texts.en:
The Nuevas Amigas group consists of 15 members who live in different places in the city of Cuenca. This city has 4 rivers which give the city beautiful landscapes; it is a mix of the colonial and modern, and since December 1999 has been a World Heritage Site. Its people are warm and hospitable, like the group members, who make their visitors feel as if they are at home. They continue to maintain the traditions of their people, and are characterized as being hard workers and always are looking for a better future for their families. 
 
One of the group members is Guadalupe, 24 years old, who lives in a common-law marriage and has 2 children, ages 4 and 2. Her first son began school this year, her spouse works as an electrical technician, and they don't have their own house since they live in a house loaned to them by a family member. 

Guadalupe takes care of the children at home, and also raises guinea pigs, chickens, and hens. This work has given her the ability to generate an income. The money from the loan is to purchase chickens and animal feed. Her goal is to have a store.

loans.use: to purchase chickens and animal feed.

loans.name: Pilar Yessica

texts.es:
Pilar es madre soltera de dos pequeños niños, por quienes se esfuerza al máximo para poder brindarles una mejor calidad de vida. Para poder sacar adelante a sus hijos trabaja como vendedora en un centro comercial, diariamente labora por un aproximado de 8 horas y cree que le está yendo bien por su esfuerzo constante y su ardua labor.
Pilar está agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva porque con el apoyo que le han brindado podrá comprar una cocina para su casa, de esta manera podrá reemplazar la que ahora tiene que está deteriorada y su manejo puede ser peligroso.
Con esto seguirá luchando por el bienestar de su familia y como toda madre quiere que sus hijos más adelante sean grandes profesionales.
texts.en:
Pilar is a single mother with two small children, for whom she works as hard as she can to be able to offer them a better quality of life. To be able to get her children ahead, she works as a vendor in a commercial center, she works about 8 hours each day and believes it is going well due to her constant efforts and arduous work.

Pilar is grateful to the Kiva lenders because with the support they have offered her, she will be able to purchase a stove for her house, and in this way she will be able to replace the one she has now which is deteriorated and using it can be dangerous.

With this, she will continue fighting for the well-being of her family and, like all mothers, she wants her children to become great professionals in the future.

loans.use: to purchase a stove for her house.

loans.name: Buena Vista Group

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal BUENA VISTA, él banco está ubicado en el distrito de Huayopata, provincia de La Convención y departamento de Cusco.
La socia Rosa tiene 48 años de edad es conviviente y tiene 01 hijo, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de cultivo de frutas como naranjas, plátanos entre otros, la socia lleva buen tiempo con su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de eta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de abono y semillas.
La socia se siente agradecida por  el crédito otorgado y se compromete  a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
La socia que sale adjunta pidió permiso para llegar tarde a la reunión por motivos de trabajo.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the community bank Buena Vista which is located in the district of Huayopata, province of Convencion and region of Cusco.   Rosa is 48 years old, is married and has 1 child.   She alternates her daily activities with her business of cultivating fruits like oranges and bananas amongst others.  Her business takes a lot of time but it is going well thanks to the efforts she puts forth every day.  Her wish is to continue working in this way in order to help her family.  She asks for the loan for the purchase of fertilizer and seeds.  She feels grateful for the loan granted and she promises to complete her established quotas.  




La socia pertenece al banco comunal BUENA VISTA, él banco está ubicado en el distrito de Huayopata, provincia de La Convención y departamento de Cusco.
La socia Rosa tiene 48 años de edad es conviviente y tiene 01 hijo, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de cultivo de frutas como naranjas, plátanos entre otros, la socia lleva buen tiempo con su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de eta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de abono y semillas.
La socia se siente agradecida por  el crédito otorgado y se compromete  a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
La socia que sale adjunta pidió permiso para llegar tarde a la reunión por motivos de trabajo.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and seeds .

loans.name: Judid Jovanny

texts.es:
Judid tiene 42 años de edad, es casada, sin hijos a su cargo, vive en en una zona rural del distrito de Oyotún, provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, costa norte de Perú. Su población se dedica a la agricultura, cmercio y ganaderia.

Judid se dedica a la elaboración de comida, con más de 10 años de experiencia en el negocio, el mismo que esta ubicado en su domicilio, ella solicita préstamo para compra de mobiliario de atención al público, dicha inversión le servirá para que aumente su productividad y poder brindar un mejor servicio con gran influencia en el negocio; Judid piensa mejorar productividad para poder atender las diversas necesidades y gustos de los clientes de la zona.
texts.en:
Judid is 42 years old. She is married without children. She lives in a rural area of the Oyotún District, in the Chiclayo Province, the Lambayeque Region, on the northern coast of Peru. Its population makes a living from agriculture, commerce, and livestock breeding.

Judid makes a living from food production. She has 10 years of experience in the business, the same that is located in her home. She is requesting the loan to purchase furniture to attend to the public. This investment will serve to increase her productivity and ability to provide a better service with a great influence in the business. Judid thinks to increase her productivity to be able to attend to the diverse necessities and tastes of the customers in the area.

loans.use: to purchase furniture to attend to the public.

loans.name: Jeremias

texts.es:
Jeremias tiene hogar estable, vive solo, reside en su casa propia en el caserío de Cabra Chica, él tiene 40 años de edad, dedicado a la agricultura cultivando piña, la casa del Jeremias se encuentra en el distrito de Pucará, provincia de Jaén, región de Cajamarca, sierra norte de Perú.

la actividad a la que se dedica Jeremias es a la agricultura, específicamente al cultivo de piña, ubicado en el caserío de Cabra Chica, con una experiencia en el rubro de 10 años, el préstamo que se le otorgará lo utilizará en labores agrícolas, aplicaciones e incorporaciones de productos fito sanitarios, fertilizantes, y mano de obra para su cosecha. de esta manera lo ayudara a la mejora tanto fisiológica, morfológica y productiva de su cultivo, y por ende tendrá mayor producción, una mejor calidad de producto, por lo cual no tendrá problemas en vender su producto a un buen precio, mejorando asi sus ingresos, sus ganancias y por consecuente su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Jeremias has a stable home. He lives alone. He resides in his own home in the small village of Cabra Chica. He is 40 years old, makes a living growing pineapple. Jeremias’s home is located in the Pucará District, Jaén Province, Cajamarca Region, in the northern mountains of Peru.

Jeremias makes a living from agriculture, specifically the cultivation of pineapple, in the small town of Cabra Chica, with 10 years of experience. He will use the loan that will be awarded to him for agricultural work, applying and adding plant protection products, fertilizers, and labor costs for his harvest. In this way, he will be helped with the physiological, morphological, and productive improvement of his crops. At the end, he will have a better production and a better quality of product, for which he will not have problems selling his product at a good price, thus improving his income, his profits, and consequently his quality of life.

loans.use: to supply agricultural work, the addition and application of plant protections products, fertilizers and labor costs for his harvest.

loans.name: Cecilia

texts.en:
Cecilia and her husband work together to support their family through farming. In the year 2010, Cecilia learned about Paglaum MPC and the financial assistance it gives start-ups. As a farmer from Sindangan, Cecilia tried her luck and borrowed a loan to jump-start their corn production. After several months, she was able to return her borrowed capital. To this day, Cecilia feels she owes her good fortune to the cooperative for having trusted her with the money she used to launch her business. Recently, she requested a loan of PHP 10,000 to purchase farm fertilizers and insecticides for her rice field. 

Cecilia wishes to sustain her business and be able to supply rice and corn in the neighboring towns.

loans.use: to buy farm fertilizers and insecticides

loans.name: Janeth

texts.en: Janeth, 43 years old, lives in Tawi-tawi, Aloran, Misamis Occidental with her husband and two children. Her husband is a construction worker. Unable to sustain the needs of the family with only her husband’s income, she has found ways to earn income through snack and food vending. It began with selling a small amount of viands and snacks to their neighbors. She joined Paglaum Cooperative, which helped her in the capitalization of her sari-sari (small grocery) store in January of 2004. Janeth became a MIGS member, which is why she has received loans several times already. Now, she is applying for a loan of PHP 10,000 to buy merchandise for her sari-sari store. She hopes that her business will continue and someday become a mini-grocery.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her sari-sari store

loans.name: Francisco

texts.es:
Francisco tiene 42 años de edad, tiene hogar estable al lado de su cónyuge y dos hijos menores de edad, uno de 14 años estudia en escuela deL caserío y el otro tiene un año de edad, vive en casa propia de material rustico de dos pisos en sector el Salluc a 20 minutos de caserío Tayales.

Francisco es nacido en caserío Tayales sector el Salluc, que está ubicado en el distrito de Santo Tomás, provincia de Cutervo, región de Cajamarca, sierra norte de Perú, Francisco se lleva bien con los miembros de su caserío y pobladores de la zona; él cuenta con buenas referencias personales y comerciales en la zona, y su vivienda cuenta con servicios de agua.

La actividad que realiza Francisco es el cultivo de café, contando a la fecha con 1,5 has. Variedad catimor resistente a enfermedades, plantación esta en segundo año de producción tiene tres años de edad, cultiva café en caserío Tayales Sector el Salluc, esta actividad la realiza hace 10 años, cuenta con experiencia en el rubro del cultivo de café. Adicionalmente se dedica a la cría de animales menores(gallinas, cuyes, chanchos y otros), también cultiva productos de pan llevar (maíz, menestras, yuca, plátanos y otros).

El destino del crédito sera para mantenimiento y cultivo de 1,5 has dee café en producción, asegurando una buena producción para campaña 2015, reflejado en un mayor volumen de ventas y por ende obtendrá mayores ingresos para así poder mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Francisco is 42 years old. He has a stable home alongside his wife and two children: a 14-year-old son studying in the hamlet's school and another son who is a year old. He lives in his own two-story home made of rustic materials in the sector of Salluc, 20 minutes from the hamlet of Tayales.


Francisco was born in the Salluc sector of the hamlet of Tayales, which is located in the district of Santo Tomás, Cutervo Province, Cajamarca region, in the northern mountains of Peru. Francisco gets along with the members of his hamlet and the residents of the area. He has good personal and business references in the area. His house has water services.


Francisco cultivates coffee. He currently has 1.5. hectares of the disease resistant "catimor" variety. The plantation is in its second year of production - it is three years old. He grows coffee in the Salluc Sector of Tayales hamlet and has been doing so for 10 years. He has experience in the area of ​​coffee cultivation. In addition, he breeds small animals (chickens, guinea pigs, pigs and others).  He also grows bread products (maize, beans, cassava, bananas and others).

The loan will be used for the maintenance and cultivation of 1.5 hectares of coffee, ensuring good production for the 2015 season, reflected in a higher sales volume and thus in a higher income. In this way, he will be able to improve his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to maintain and cultivate 1.5 hectares of coffee ensuring good production.

loans.name: Teresa

texts.en:
Teresa is 47 years old and married with four children. Two of her children are in school. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. 

Teresa has a food vending business in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 19,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy ingredients for her food business.

Teresa has been in this business for five years. In the future, she would like to save enough money to expand her business and continue to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food business.

loans.name: Teodora

texts.en:
Teodora is 64 years old and married with ten children. She works very hard to provide for them.

Teodora runs a variety store in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase more items like snack foods, noodles, sardines, and other groceries. Teodora has been in this business for twelve years and sells a variety of items such as soap, curls, candies, sugar, and bread. 

In the future, Teodora would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more items like snack foods, noodles, sardines, and other groceries.

loans.name: Astou Cheikh

texts.fr:
Cette femme fait parti du banc villageois qui a été crée le 17 avril 2010. Il est composé de membres qui habitent le même village et ceux des environs. Elles sont solidaires  et font  comme activités génératrices de revenus, le commerce et l’embouche. 
Astou est âgée de 38 ans, elle est mariée et mère de 8 enfants dont 5 filles, le plus jeune des enfants à 2 semaines.
Avec le prêt elle va acheter 5 moutons à 40000f l’un. Après élevage elle compte vendre un mouton à 75000f. Elle achète aussi de l’huile de palm à 25000f les 20litres pour revendre  à 32500f ; de l’huile d’arachide à 14000f pour avoir 18000f.
Les bénéfices lui permettent de renforcer son activité, de payer ses intérêts, renforcer ses épargnes, assister son mari dans la gestion  des charges de la famille, achat de vêtements, fournitures scolaires.
texts.en:
This woman belongs to the Banc Villageois which was set up on 17th April 2010. It is made up of members who live in the same village and its surroundings. They are supportive of one another and their income generating activities are trading and raising animals. 

Astou is 38 years old, married and mother to eight children, five of whom are girls; the youngest child is two weeks old. With her loan she is going to buy five sheep at 40,000 francs each. Once she has raised them she is planning to sell one for 75,000 francs. She is also buying palm oil at a cost of 25,000 francs for 20 liters to resell it at 32,500 francs, as well as groundnut oil which she will buy at 14,000 francs to resell at 18,000 francs. The profits she makes will allow her to boost her business, pay the interest on her loan, build up her savings and help her husband with the family's expenses, the purchase of clothes and school equipment.

loans.use: to buy sheep, palm oil and groundnut oil.

loans.name: Jocelyn

texts.en: Jocelyn, 30, is a mother of three living in Aurora, Zamboanga del Sur with her family. Her husband works as a truck man while Jocelyn sells different kinds of plastic wares to make a living. She is determined to improve her business in preparation for the future education of her children. She has joined Gata Daku MPC and requested a new loan to buy additional stocks of plastic wares to sell. She hopes to become successful in her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy additional stocks of plastic wares to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy construction materials to finish the walls of a room.

loans.name: Ndeye Sophie's Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe de 05 membres fait parti du banc villageois qui a été créé le 05 février 2001. Il est composé de membres habitant la localité et les villages environnants. Ces membres entretiennent de bonnes relations et exercent tous le petit commerce.
Ndeye, debout à droite de la photo et levant la main est âgée de 52 ans. Elle est veuve et mère de 06 enfants dont 03 filles.
Elle fait le commerce de légumes et de denrées. Elle s’approvisionne dans une grande ville de la place. Elle achète : 80 kg de carottes à 400 F le Kg, 40 kg de choux à 600 F, 60 kg de poisson sèches à 350 F le kg, 70 kg d’oignons à 400 F le kg, le savon local à 200 F l’unité. Elle revend à 800 F le kg de carottes et de choux, 500 F le poisson séché et l’oignon, le savon à 250 F.
Avec les bénéfices, elle prendre en charge la nourriture de le famille, les fournitures scolaires des enfants leur habillement et leur soins médicaux.
texts.en:
This group, which comprises five members, belongs to the Banc Villageois which was set up on 5th February 2001. It is made up of members who live in the town and surrounding villages; they all get on well together and have small trading businesses. 

Ndeye, who is standing on the right of the photo with her hand raised, is 52 years old. She is a widow and mother to six children, three of whom are girls. She buys and sells vegetables and groceries. She gets her supplies in a large local town. She is buying:  80 kilos of carrots at 400 francs a kilo, 40 kilos of cabbages at 600 francs a kilo, 60 kilos of dried fish at 350 francs a kilo, 70 kilos of onions at 400 francs a kilo and local soaps at 200 francs each. She resells carrots and cabbages at 800 francs a kilo, dried fish and onions at 500 francs, and soaps at 250 francs.

With the profits she makes, she takes responsibility for the family's food, the children's school equipment and their clothing and healthcare.

loans.use: to buy vegetables and groceries.

loans.name: Mélé

texts.fr:
_ -  
Agée de 44 ans,  Mélé est  mariée  et  mère d’un  enfant  résidant  à Adidogomé. Elle a commencée  son activité  de  commerce en  vendant  des chaussures. Elle s'approvisionne  1 fois  par mois à  grand marché de lomé  et  revend  par vente ambulante.  Mélé  sollicite  un crédit pour agrandir  son  commerce  afin  de  satisfaire sa clientèle et  faire plus de profit
texts.en: Mélé is 44 years old and married with one child. She lives in Adidogomé. She started her commercial activity selling shoes. She stocks up once a month at the big market in Lomé, and sells her merchandise as an itinerant saleswoman. Mélé requests  a loan to expand her business in order to satisfy her clientele and to make more profit.

loans.use: to buy 12 pairs of shoes.

loans.name: Adjoavi

texts.fr: Adjoavi âgée de  58 ans, veuve et mère de 7 enfants résident à Adidogomé. Elle vend des   charbon de bois et maïs. Elle s'approvisionne 2 fois par mois à la  tsévié et revend dans sa boutique de son domicile. Adjoavi sollicite ce crédit pour agrandir son commerce afin de faire plus de profit
texts.en: Adjoavi, who is 58 years old, is a widow and mother to seven children; they live in Adidogomé. She sells charcoal and corn, and gets her supplies twice a month in Tsévié. She resells her products in a shop at her home. Adjoavi is requesting this loan to expand her business so she can make more profits.

loans.use: to buy seven sacks of charcoal and corn.

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en: Teresita, 58, is married to a farmer and blessed with four children. She owns and manages a retail store in her village and earns a net income of 800 PHP daily. Her net income from this business usually spent on her family's daily expenses at home. Due to insufficient funds, she would like to receive a loan amounting to 14,000 PHP to purchase vegetable seedlings and fertilizer for vegetable production. She's hoping that her business will continue to improve and become more profitable.

loans.use: to purchase vegetable seedlings and fertilizer for her vegetable production.

loans.name: Nora Yesenia

texts.es:
Nora Yesenia tiene 39 años de edad, es conviviente, conocida en el medio, por la labor de crianza y venta de chivos. Vive en casa propia, con su conyuge e hijos de 17, 12 y 07años respectivamente, los cuales estudian en colegio nacional de la zona. Su conyuge trabaja como obrero agrícola en la empresa agrícola Pomalca desde hace casi 12 años. Nora Yesenia cuenta con buenas referencias personales y laborales. Vive en una comunidad en la cual viven gente respetuosa y trabajadora, dedicadas al comercio y ganaderia; está ubicada en el distrito de Saña, provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, costa norte de Perú.

Nora Yesenia se dedica a la crianza y venta de chivos, desde hace casi 02 años aproximadamente y también se dedica a la venta de jugo de naranja en mercado de saltur desde hace un año. Ella necesita préstamo para invertir en capital de trabajo, compra de cerdos, chivos y alimento de engorde para estos, lo que le generará mayores ventas y esto le dara mejor calidad de vida a su unidad familiar.
texts.en:
Nora Yesenia is 39, married, a mother of three children, ages 17, 12, and 7, who all attend the local public secondary school. Her husband has worked as a farm laborer for the agribusiness company Pomalca for nearly 12 years. The family lives in their own home in Saña District, in Chiclayo Province, in the Lambayeque region along the northern coast of Peru. Many people in this area earn a living from ranching or running small businesses; they also have a reputation as hard workers who treat others with respect. 

Nora Yesenia has for the past two years raised and sold kid goats. In addition to managing a herd, she has also been selling orange juice at a local market for the past year. Nora Yesenia has strong personal and business references, and is applying for a loan so that she'll have working capital for the purchase of pigs, kid goats, and animal feed. These investments will boost her sales and improve her family's quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase pigs, kid goats, and animal feed.

loans.name: Susan

texts.en:
Susan is 46 years old and married with three children, one of whom is in school.

Susan works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 12500 PHP loan through NWTF in order to purchase more stocks of groceries to sell.

Susan has borrowed and repaid six loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 15 years and also earns an income from food vending.

Susan aspires to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more grocery inventory to sell.

loans.name: Kangnivi

texts.fr:
_ - 
KANGNIVI âgée de  34 ans, mariée et père de 2 enfants résident à Adidogomé. IL  est dans la   fabrication des chaussures. IL s'approvisionne une fois par mois au  marché assiyéyé et revend dans une baraque du marché environnant. KANGNIVI sollicite ce crédit pour agrandir son commerce afin de faire plus de profit
texts.en: Kangnivi is 34 years old and married with two children. He lives in Adidogomé. He works in the shoemaking trade. He buys his stock once a month at the market in Assiyéyé, and sells his merchandise from a shack in a neighbouring market. Kangnivi requests this loan to expand his business in order to make more profit.

loans.use: to buy 11 pairs of soles for making shoes.

loans.name: Mawoussi

texts.fr:
_ -  
Agée de 34 ans,  Mawoussi est  mariée  et  mère d’un  enfant  résidant  à Adidogomé. Elle a commencée  son activité  de  commerce en  vendant  des glacières . Elle s'approvisionne  2 fois  par mois à  grand marché de lomé  et  revend  par vente ambulante.  Mawoussi  sollicite  un crédit pour agrandir  son  commerce  afin  de  satisfaire sa clientèle et  faire plus de profit.
texts.en: Mawoussi is 34 years old, married and mother to one child; they live in Adidogomé. She has begun a buinsess selling ice-boxes and gets her supplies twice a month at Lomé's Grand Market. She resells her products on a door-to-door basis. Mawoussi is requesting a loan to expand her buisness, satisfy customer demand and make more money.

loans.use: to buy 37  plastic ice-boxes.

loans.name: Amah

texts.fr:
_-  
Agée de 36 ans,  Amah est  mariée  et  mère d’un  enfant  résidant  à Adidogomé. Elle a commencée  son activité  de  commerce en  vendant  des chaussures . Elle s'approvisionne  2 fois  par mois à  grand marché de lomé  et  revend  par vente ambulante.  Amah  sollicite  un crédit pour agrandir  son  commerce  afin  de  satisfaire sa clientèle et  faire plus de profit.
texts.en: Amah is 36 years old, married and mother to one chlld. They live in Adidogomé. She has begun a business selling shoes and gets her supplies twice a month from Lomé's Grand Market. She resells her goods on a door-to-door basis. Amah is requesting a loan to expand her business so that she can meet customer demand and make more money.

loans.use: to buy four dozen shoes.

loans.name: Luis

texts.es:
El socio Luis continua dedicándose  a la agricultura, la crianza de animales menores y la ganadería ,el socio lleva años dedicándose a sus negocios el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a sus actividades ,el socio desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
 En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar abono y semillas.
El socio se siente agradecido por el crédito otorgado y se compromete  a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en: Luis continues to earn a living by farming and raising livestock, as he has for many years. The diligence and energy that Luis applies to the various daily tasks that his crops and his herd require have paid off. He is doing well, and hopes that he can continue to work and support his family. Luis is applying for a loan to purchase manure and seeds. He is grateful for the loan that he's already repaid and is determined to the timely repayment of this new loan.

loans.use: to purchase manure and seeds.

loans.name: Netina

texts.en: Netina is 48 years old and married with five children. She has a small plantation where she grows taro and bananas that she can sell in her community or at the market. She has been doing this for three years. Netina needs a loan to buy a new wheelbarrow, crops, a machete, a crowbar, a tiller, chemicals, and gloves. She has been a member of SPBD since 2011. Netina will use the profits from her sales to pay for her family's weekly expenses.

loans.use: to buy a new wheelbarrow, crops, a machete, a crowbar, a tiller, chemicals, and gloves

loans.name: Yawa

texts.fr:
- 
Yawa âgée de  54 ans, mariée et mère  de 3 enfants résident à Adidogomé. Elle  vend du  riz préparé. Elle s'approvisionne une fois par mois à la marché assiyéyé et revend dans une école et dans les quartiers environnants. Yawa sollicite ce crédit pour agrandir son commerce afin de faire plus de profit
texts.en: Yawa is 54 years old and married with three children. She lives in Adidogomé. She sells cooked rice. She buys her stock once a month at the market in Assiyéyé, and sells her merchandise in a school and in the surrounding districts. Yawa requests this loan in order to expand her business and to make more profit.

loans.use: to buy four sacks of rice and four boxes of spaghetti.

loans.name: Adjo

texts.fr:
- 
mariée âgée de 41 ans, Adjo  réside à Adidogomé. Elle vend  des swiduch. Elle  s'approvisionne 1 fois  par mois à  marché assiyéyé. Elle  revend par vente ambulante dans son quartier . Adjo sollicite ce crédit pour agrandir son commerce afin de satisfaire sa clientèle et  faire plus de profit.
texts.en: Adio is 41 years old and married, and she lives in Adidogomé. She sells sandwiches and gets her supplies once a month at the market in Assiyéyé. She sells her sandwiches on a door-to-door basis in her neighborhood. Adjo is requesting this loan to expand her business, so she can satisfy customer demand and make more money.

loans.use: to buy 100 loaves of bread and a carton of fish.

loans.name: Mama

texts.fr:
-  
Mama âgée de  44 ans, mariée et mère  de 6 enfants résident à Adidogomé. Elle  vend   poissons. Elle s'approvisionne 4 fois par mois au frigo du quartier et revend dans le marché de BoKovi. Mama sollicite ce crédit pour agrandir son commerce afin de faire plus de profit
texts.en: Mama is 44 years old, married and mother to six children; they live in Adidogomé. She sells fish and gets her supplies four times a month from the refrigerator in her neighborhood. She resells her fish at the market in Bokovi. Mama is requesting this loan to expand her business so she can make more money.

loans.use: to buy six cartons of fish.

loans.name: Mama

texts.fr:
- 
mariée âgée de 38 ans, Mama  réside à Adidogomé. Elle vend  des bois de chauffe. Elle  s'approvisionne 1 fois  par mois à  Kpalimé. Elle  revend a la devanture de son domicile. Mama sollicite ce crédit pour agrandir son commerce afin de satisfaire sa clientèle et  faire plus de profit.
texts.en: Mama is 38 years old, married and lives in Adidogomé. She sells firewood and gets her supplies once a month from Kpalimé. She resells the firewood in front of her home. Mama is requesting this loan to expand her business so she can meet customer demand and make more money.

loans.use: to buy 127 piles of firewood.

loans.name: Afi

texts.fr:
_ -  
Demeurant  à  Lomé dans le quartier Adidogomé,  Afi  est  âgée de 37 ans. Elle est mariée  et  mère  de 4 enfants  .  Mamotou   vend  les   charbon de bois et céréales. Elle   s’approvisionne  2 fois par  mois  à  oké et  revend  devant sa maison  . Afi sollicite un prêt pour agrandir  son commerce et faire plus bénéfice.
texts.en: Afi, who lives in Lomé in the Adidogomé district, is 37 years old. She is married and mother to four children.  She sells charcoal and cereals, and gets her supplies twice a month in Oke; she resells her products in front of her house. Afi is requesting a loan to expand her business and make more money.

loans.use: to buy three sacks of charcoal and corn.

loans.name: Perelini

texts.en: Perelini is 30 years old and unmarried with 3 children. She owns and operates a small store, selling a variety of items. She has been doing this for 5 years. Perelini needs a loan to buy a new display fridge, a chest freezer, snacks, frozen goods, canned food, and sacks of onions and potatoes. She hopes to use her profits to pay for the renovation of her house and to help pay for her children's education. She became a member of SPBD in 2009 to gain access to capital for her business.

loans.use: to buy a new display fridge, a chest freezer, snacks, frozen goods, canned food, and sacks of onions and potatoes

loans.name: Fatiauma

texts.en: Fatiauma is 39 years old and married with 7 children. She owns and operates a small store, selling a variety of items. She has been doing this for 5 years. Fatiauma needs a loan to buy a new display fridge, snacks, canned food, frozen goods, and bags of rice and sugar. She hopes to use her profits to pay for the renovation of her house and to help pay for her children's education. She became a member of SPBD in 2009 to gain access to capital for her business.

loans.use: to buy a new display fridge, snacks, canned food, frozen goods, and bags of rice and sugar

loans.name: Amivi

texts.fr:
-  
Agée de 38 ans,  Amivi est  mariée  et  mère d’un  enfant  résidant  à Adidogomé. Elle a commencée  son activité  de  commerce en  vendant  des  céréales .  Elle s'approvisionne  2 fois  par mois à  grand marché de lomé  et  revend  a son domicile de sa devanture.  Amivi  sollicite  un crédit pour agrandir  son  commerce  afin  de  satisfaire sa clientèle et  faire plus de profit.
texts.en: Amivi is 38 years old. She is married with one child and lives in Adidogomé. She has started a business selling cereals. She buys her stock twice a month at the big market in Lomé, and sells her merchandise in front of her home. Amivi requests a loan to expand her business in order to satisfy her clientele and to make more profit.

loans.use: to buy three sacks of corn and four sacks of rice.

loans.name: Mamotou

texts.fr:
_  -   
Demeurant  à  Lomé dans le quartier Adidogomé,  Mamotou  est  âgée de 38 ans. Elle est mariée  et  mère  de 4 enfants .  Mamotou   vend les  céréales. Elle   s’approvisionne  1 fois par  mois  à  Anié et  revend  devant  sa  maison  . Mamotou sollicite un prêt pour agrandir  son commerce et faire plus bénéfice.
texts.en: Mamotou is 38 years old and lives in the Adidogomé district of Lomé. She is married with four children. She sells cereals. She buys her stock once a month at Anié, and sells her merchandise in front of her house. Mamotou requests a loan to expand her business and to make more profit.

loans.use: to buy 40 bowls of corn, 90 bowls of beans, and 95 bowls of soya.

loans.name: Marie

texts.fr:
_  -  
veuve âgée de 46 ans, Marie  réside à  Adidogomé. Elle vend  de la boisson locales. Elle  s'approvisionne 1 fois  par mois à  marché assiyéyé. Elle  revend a la devanture de son domicile. Marie sollicite ce crédit pour agrandir son commerce afin de satisfaire sa clientèle et  faire plus de profit.
texts.en: Marie is a 46-year old widow who lives in Adidogomé. She sells local drinks and gets her supplies once a month at the market in Assiyéyé. She resells in front of her home. Marie is requesting this loan to expand her business so she can meet customer demand and make more money.

loans.use: to buy six sacks of millet.

loans.name: Annabelle

texts.en:
Annabelle is 51 years old and lives in Punta, Panaon, Misamis Occidental. She is married with 1 adult child. 

Annabelle earns a living from agriculture. She has been producing rice for more than 15 years to support her husband, who is nearing retirement from the PNP.  Annabelle earns approximately PHP 3,000 each month doing this type of work. She has requested a loan to purchase 5 sacks of commercial fertilizers, 1 liter of insecticides, and 1 liter of foliar liquid fertilizer. Annabelle has been a member of PMPC for almost 9 years. 

In the future, Annabelle hopes to engage in other types of agribusiness.

loans.use: To buy 5 sacks of commercial fertilizers, 1 liter of insecticides, and 1 liter of foliar liquid fertilizer

loans.name: Erdenechimeg

texts.en: Erdenechimeg, 50 years old, lives with her youngest son in Darkhan, the second-largest city in Mongolia. She has been working as a technician at a weather research institute since 1984. Her two elder sons are married and live on their own. Her youngest son studies at college. Erdenechimeg is requesting a loan of 1,000,000 MNT to repair the heating system in her apartment. As winter is coming, it is necessary to repair the damaged parts of the heating system. The repair will stop inefficient heat loss and preserve much more energy.

loans.use: to repair the heating system in her apartment.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy pagne textiles, wine and other products.

loans.name: Berawan Salak Permai Group

texts.en:
Ni Kadek is the head of the Berawan Salak Permai group, earning a daily living as a pig farmer. She lives with her husband and a child. Ni Kadek is trying to develop her pig business by borrowing 1,500,000 IDR from MUK.

From the sale of two pigs, Ni Kadek manages to earn a profit of 750,000 IDR. The gain is very helpful to her family's finances as they are currently experiencing difficult times due to increasingly expensive necessities.

Ni Kadek, with the Berawan Salak Permai group, has decided to continue borrowing from MUK as the loans have been especially helpful in developing their pig businesses. Because the price of pigs and pig feed is growing, Ni Kadek expects an increase in borrowing in the next period.

Ni Kadek wants to increase her business by keeping local pigs. She needs a new loan to purchase superior piglets, vitamins, medicines, and feed. Her husband supports her business by helping her to give feed and clean the cage. Ni Kadek will save her profits because she has a dream to renovate her kitchen.

loans.use: to purchase superior piglets, vitamins, medicines, and feed

loans.name: Felicitas

texts.es:
La socia Felicitas continua dedicándose  a la venta de productos secos como maíz, cebada, trigo y otros productos, la socia lleva buen tiempo con su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar maíz para su negocio.
La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
Felicitas continues to work in the sale of dried goods like corn, barley, wheat and other products. She has been running her business for quite some time now, and it is going well thanks to the effort that she puts into her business each day. At this time, she is requesting a loan to buy corn for her business.

She feels grateful for the loan she has received, and promises to make the established payments.

loans.use: to buy corn for her business.

loans.name: Carmen

texts.en:
Carmen has faithfully paid back her previous loan, which she used for her business. She has been operating her own rug-making business for years and she earns well from her work. Having a bigger responsibility requires more effort to provide for their needs. She has to work hard, with the determination to earn a better income, to provide the needs of her family. 

To improve her profit, Carmen would like to apply for a new loan. With PHP 8,000, she could purchase more quantities of raw materials like fabric, thread, and other supplies for her business. She sincerely expresses her heartfelt thanks and appreciation for this assistance in advance.

In the future, Carmen hopes to grow her business as well as buy another sewing machine. She endeavors to provide her family a good life through her business. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week. This is where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the word of God she studies. 

* All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the word of God, build social capital, and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: To buy cloth for making rugs and doormats.

loans.name: Ruel

texts.en: In 2012, Ruel learned about Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative and the financial assistance it gives start-ups. Ruel tried his luck by starting a business focusing on his farming activities. He feels that he owes his fortune to the Cooperative for having trusted him with the money he used as capital. Ruel is requesting another loan in the amount of PHP 10,000 to pay for seedlings and compost. He hopes this will help him to give his farming income a big boost. Ruel looks for better business opportunities and would love to be in the position to help others someday.

loans.use: to pay for seedlings and compost

loans.name: Burulkan

texts.ru: Бурулкан 61 год, замужем, мать 4 детей. У Бурулкан - среднее образование, с 1980 года занимается животноводством и полеводством. Благодаря упорному труду Бурулкан, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется 2 коровы, лошадь и 30 овец, также есть 3,20 ГА поливной земли, где Бурулкан выращивает фасоль и клевер для внутрихозяйственного потребления и реализации. Экологически чистая и вкусная сельскохозяйственная продукция Бурулкан пользуется большим спросом, принося ежемесячный доход около 10,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Бурулкан обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 30,000 сом (KGS) на покупку одной коровы, для увеличения объемов реализации молока. Доходы от кредита помогут Бурулкан увеличить сарай для скота и приобрести бытовую технику для семьи.
texts.en: Burulkan is 61, married, and has four children. She has a high school education and has been raising livestock and planting crops since 1980. Thanks to her hard work, Burulkan currently has two cows, a horse, and 30 sheep, along with a 3.20 hectare plot of land where she plants beans and clover to use on the farm and to sell. Delicious, organic agricultural products are in high demand and Burulkan earns about 10,000 som (KGS) per month. In order to continue expanding her farm, Burulkan applied for a loan of 30,000 som (KGS) to buy a cow so that she can sell more milk. The profits from the loan will help Burulkan build a larger barn for the livestock and to buy household appliances for her family.

loans.use: To buy a cow so that she can sell more milk

loans.name: Ganbat

texts.en:
Ganbat, 24 years old, lives with his wife in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. He began working as a geologist at the geology institution in May, 2014. His wife provides a taxi service between districts. 

He is requesting a loan of 2,700 USD to buy a heavy truck in order to began a new business. He will rent out his truck to anyone who is in need of a heavy truck during the mining boom.

loans.use: to buy a heavy truck.

loans.name: Martina

texts.es:
La socia Martina continua dedicándose a la  agricultura, a la ganadería y a la crianza de animales menores como por ejemplo cuyes y gallinas , la socia lleva buen tiempo con su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de cuyes.
La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas
texts.en:
Martina continues to make a living in farming, cattle raising, and raising small animals such as guinea pigs and hens. She has had this business for quite some time, and it is going well thanks to the effort that she puts into her business each day. She wants to keep working so that she can keep supporting her family.

She is requesting a loan in order to buy guinea pigs. She feels grateful for the loan she has received, and promises to make the established payments.

loans.use: to buy guinea pigs.

loans.name: Esmeralda

texts.en: Esmeralda is requesting a loan of $1000 to improve her business. She will use the loan to buy some additional inventory for her kiosk such as coffee, noodles, detergents, water, toothpaste, sugar, sweets, and other things to sell, including soft drinks. Esmeralda started her kiosk in 2010 with her own working capital of $700. She wants to improve her management in the future, so she is taking a loan from Tuba Rai Metin.
